ASCO.AT.long_name: As Commercial Industrial Company of Computers and Toys S.A.
ASCO.AT.summary: As Commercial Industrial Company of Computers and Toys S.A. manufactures, imports, and trades in toys for various ages in Greece and internationally. It offers approximately 1,500 game codes. The company also sells its products online. In addition, it is involved in the wholesale trade of toys and computers; and import of kids clothing. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Thessaloniki, Greece.

BELA.AT.summary: Jumbo S.A. engages in the retail of toys, baby products, gift articles, household products, stationery, seasonal and decoration items, books, and related products. As of December 31, 2019, the company operated 80 stores, including 52 stores in Greece, 5 stores in Cyprus, 9 stores in Bulgaria, and 14 stores in Romania. It also operates e-jumbo, an on line store. In addition, the company is involved in the wholesale of toys and related products to third parties. Jumbo S.A. was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Athens, Greece.

DAIOS.AT.summary: Daios Plastics S.A. produces and sells plastic films for agricultural applications in Europe and internationally. The company offers plastic films for soft fruit protection applications; greenhouse films for protecting crops; tubes for transferring the warm air; greenhouse sides; gutters; asparagus films; low-tunnels; mulch films; and drip irrigation products. It also provides industrial packaging products, such as shrink films and hoods, and various stretch hoods for water bottling companies, cement and polypropylene producers, and other industries. The company was founded in 1974 and is based in Naousa, Greece.

DROME.AT.summary: Dromeas SA produces and sells office furniture, partition walls, filing systems, and custom-made furniture solutions. It offers office chairs and desk seating products, including executive, working, visitor, and conference chairs; public and auditorium seating products; stools; and office lounge chairs and sofas. The company also provides desk and workstations, such as executive and work desks, conference and meeting tables, sit/stand desks, auxiliary desks, and folding tables; pedestals, including executive, melamine, and metallic pedestals products; melamine, veneer, and metallic bookcases; and sliding tracked storage systems. In addition, it offers furniture for education and reception, as well as space division accessories; and sound absorbing partitions. Further, the company provides die-casted aluminum equipment for the automotive industry. It offers its products through 32 branded stores in Greece and the Balkans; and exports its products to the United Kingdom, Germany, Belgium, Switzerland, Australia, Saudi Arabia, the United Arab Emirates, Qatar, Egypt, Cyprus, Russia, Bulgaria, and Albania. Dromeas SA was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Serres, Greece.

DUR.AT.summary: Duros S.A. operates as a menswear company in Greece. It offers shirts, polo shirts, knitwear and cardigans, T-shirts, trousers, jackets, suits, blazers, and shoes. The company was founded in 1960 and is based in Patras, Greece.

ELBE.AT.summary: Elve S.A. manufactures and sells uniforms, corporate clothing, accessories, and personal protective equipment in France and internationally. It offers corporate clothes for museums, banks, casinos, hotels, and organizations; and T-shirts, polo shirts, and hoodies for gas stations, telecommunication chain stores, and others. The company also provides labor clothing and accessories, such as jackets, security pants, waterproof clothing, body suits, safety shoes, reflective clothing, accessories, gloves, and hats; and safety clothing and personal protective equipment, including bulletproof vests, warmth and waterproof clothes, safety shoes, accessories, clothing bags, isothermal, gloves, etc. In addition, it invest in and owns 5 solar energy parks with a total power of 5.2 MW. The company was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Kavala, Greece.

FLEXO.AT.long_name: Flexopack Société Anonyme Commercial and Industrial Plastics Company
FLEXO.AT.summary: Flexopack SociÃ©tÃ© Anonyme Commercial and Industrial Plastics Company, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells flexible plastic packaging materials in Greece, other European countries, and internationally. It primarily offers barrier and non-barrier films. The company's products include shrink bags and films, skin films, thermoforming films, lidding films, and vacuum pouches; lamination films; and multi-layer co-extrusion films. It serves the food industry, which include meat, poultry, cheese, and fish, as well as printing/conversion and personal care packaging industries. The company was founded in 1979 and is based in Koropi, Greece.

KARE.AT.summary: Karelia Tobacco Company Inc. engages in the manufacture and wholesale of tobacco products in Greece. The company provides cigarettes, cigars, hand rolling cigarettes, and other duty free tobacco products under the George Karelias and Sons, OmÃ©, Karelia Slims, Karelia Blue, Oriental Mist, American Legend, Leader, Karelia Royal, and Wellington brand names. It also exports its products to approximately 65 countries. The company was founded in 1888 and is based in Kalamata, Greece.

KEPEN.AT.summary: Flour Mills Kepenos S.A. produces and sells wheat and other cereals flours in Greece. The company provides durum, soft, extra special, special, and whole meal wheat flours. It serves various industries, bakeries, patisseries, bakeshops, and small or large-scale businesses. Flour Mills Kepenos S.A. was founded in 1952 and is headquartered in Patras, Greece.

KRI.AT.summary: Kri-Kri Milk Industry S.A. produces and sells dairy products in Greece. The company offers ice creams, yogurt, and milk. It also exports its products to approximately 24 countries in Europe, the Balkans, and the Middle East. The company was founded in 1954 and is headquartered in Serres, Greece.

KTILA.AT.summary: Ktima Kostas Lazaridis S.A. engages in the production and sale of wines in Greece. It offers various families of wines, including Amethystos, ChÃ¢teau Julia, Domaine Costa Lazaridi, Oenotria Land, and Oenodea. The company also provides Idoniko Tsipouro, Idoniko Ouzo, and various Methexis grape distills; Botanico balsamic vinegars; and Magnum. It exports its products to approximately 23 countries worldwide. The company was founded in 1979 and is based in Drama, Greece.

KYLO.AT.summary: Loulis Mills S.A. produces and trades in flour products in Greece, Cyprus, and Bulgaria. It operates through four segments: Consumer Products, Professional Products, Mixtures & Raw Material for Bakery & Pastry, and Training Services. The company offers flour for domestic use, as well as for food, bakery, biscuit, pasta making, and food and pastry crafts industries; and secondary processors, as well as mixtures and raw material for bakery and pastry. It also provides educational services, including seminars on bakery, confectionery bakery, food technology, and marketing and financial management of bakery. The company was formerly known as Kylindromylos Loulis S.A. and changed its name to Loulis Mills S.A. in 2001. Loulis Mills S.A. was founded in 1782 and is headquartered in Almyros, Greece.

KYRI.AT.summary: Kiriacoulis Mediterranean Cruises Shipping SA, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the professional sea tourism, tourist ports management, and real estate businesses. It offers yacht chartering services, flotillas, bareboat chartering services, crew chartering services, etc. The company also sells new and second hand yachts, including sailboats, monohulls, catamarans, and motorboats, as well as provides parking spaces. It operates through a fleet of approximately 270 owned and managed yachts in Greece, Italy, Croatia, France, Malta, Spain, the Caribbean, and internationally. The company was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Athens, Greece.

KYSA.AT.summary: Flour Mills C. Sarantopoulos S.A. produces and sells flour and semolina in Greece. It offers bakery flour, luxury flour, durum wheat flour, and flour for industrial companies. The company also offers by-products, such as brans, buns, special bits, and alps to livestock cooperatives and feed industries. It serves customers in biscuit, bakery, and pasta industries. Flour Mills C. Sarantopoulos S.A. was founded in 1912 and is headquartered in Keratsini, Greece.

MODA.AT.summary: N. Varveris-Moda Bagno S.A. engages in the retail trade of bathroom and kitchen products in Europe. The company offers bathroom accessories and sanitary ware; tiles; carpets; parquets; kitchen products; office and lighting products; furniture, including wardrobes, sofas, tables, beds, chairs and armchairs, and outdoor furniture; household appliances; and other accessories, as well as home and office space equipment. It primarily serves hotels, business centers, restaurants, superyachts, etc. through its Moda Bagno and Interni stores. The company was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Vrilissia, Greece.

MSHOP.AT.summary: Mediterra S.A. engages in retail business activities in Greece and internationally. The company's stores offer traditional products, such as loukoums, taffy sweets, fruit preserves in syrup, cookies, candies, and traditional sweets; snacks and chocolates; Mastiha chewing gums and breakfast products; grocery, including cereals, pasta products, dips, jams, spreads, olives and olive oil products, salty flavors, and salads; Mastiha liqueur and wines; cosmetics, parapharmaceutical products, and publications and gifts; and organic products. It operates 16 stores under the mastihashop brand. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Chios, Greece. Mediterra S.A. is a subsidiary of Chios Mastiha Growers Association.

NIKAS.AT.summary: P.G. Nikas S.A. produces and distributes shelf, bench, and freezing cured meat in Greece. The company offers turkey, chicken, ham and pork shoulder, pariza and parizaki, dry salami, sausages, mortadella, bacon, and lion products. The company provides its products under the Nikas brand name. P.G. Nikas S.A. was founded in 1966 and is based in Agios Stefanos, Greece.

PAIR.AT.summary: E. Pairis S.A. produces and sells plastic products made of polyethylene, polypropylene, and terepthalic polyethylene in Greece. The company was founded in 1954 and is based in Aspropyrgos, Greece.

PAP.AT.summary: Papoutsanis S.A. produces and sells body, face, and hair care products in Greece and internationally. The company offers shower gels, shampoos, hand washes, face cleansers, hand and body lotions, body oils, hair conditioners, hair masks and oils, hand creams, soaps, bathing and shaving foams, liquid soaps, antiseptic hand gels, fragrances, and soap noodles, as well as accessories, such as paper cases, dental and shaving kits, shower and bath caps, sewing kits, vanity sets, nail files, cotton tips and pads, class caps, stirrers, shoe-shine sponges, bath sponges, slippers, and display stands. The company offers its products under the Olivia, HAIRCHIC, KARAVAKI, Aromatics, Natura, Green Olive Soap, Glycerine Soap, L'OCCITANE Hotel ?menities, Korres, Sarbacane, Olive Care, Olivia Fusion, Skin Essentials, For Kids, Ahava, Eau De Grece, and SOAP NOODLES brands. It also exports to Europe, America, Asia and Oceania. The company was formerly known as Plias SA. Papoutsanis S.A. was founded in 1870 and is based in Chalkida, Greece.

PETRO.AT.summary: Petros Petropoulos AEBE manufactures, modifies, distributes, and supports a range of automotive products in Greece and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Motor Vehicle, Self-Propelled Machines, and Car Care. It offers trucks and buses under the SCANIA, ISUZU, Allison Transmission, KOGEL, and GETMAN brands; passenger cars under the LAND ROVER and JAGUAR brands; generating sets under the PETROGEN brand; and engines and boats under the ZODIAC, ZODIAC MILPRO, EVINRUDE, AVON, Bombard, SEADOO, can-am, SPYDER, TOHATSU, ISUZU, Perkins, Perkins Marine, KOHLER, LOMBARDINI, LOMBARDINI Marine, SCANIA, and BRIGGS & STRATTON brands. The company also provides agricultural equipment under the McCORMICK, Landini, and Kubota brands; semi trucks under the ISUZU brand; and industrial equipment under the Ingersoll Rand and Sauer Compressors brands. In addition, it offers lubricants under the Shell and Rocol brands; Batteries under the EXIDE and HANKOOK brands; and Tires under the COOPERTIRES, INTERSTATE TIRES, AVON TYRES, and Starfire TIRES brands. The company was founded in 1922 and is headquartered in Athens, Greece.

PLAT.AT.long_name: Thrace Plastics Holding and Commercial S.A.
PLAT.AT.summary: Thrace Plastics Holding and Commercial S.A. produces and distributes polypropylene products in Greece and internationally. The company provides various technical fabrics, such as woven and non-woven geotextiles, geogrids, geocomposites, geosynthetic clay liners, drainage geonets, geobags, silt fences, erosion corrosion mats, and mini rolls; stadium seats, ridge fabrics, roofing membranes, housewraps, concrete fibers, scaffolding, road safety nets, and vapor control layers for use in construction; and ground covers, root barriers, weather protection and crop covers, foliage removal fabrics, heavy duty protection fabrics, mulching, nets, cages/screens/shades, ropes, and twines for agri/horticulture/aquaculture. It also offers fabrics for landscape gardening; trampoline fabrics and pool covers for sport and leisure use; gowns and drapes, instrument tray wraps, medical wipes, ostomy, and mattress protection fabrics for medical and hygiene use; air and liquid filtration fabrics; and covering-separation, pocket spring, and table cloth fabrics, as well as fabrics for aquashield and bedding reinforcements. In addition, the company provides fabrics for automotive flooring and seating, and car covers; packaging fabrics; advanced fabrics/composites; floor coverings; and industrial fabrics for use in tarpaulin, lamination-reinforcing substrates, passenger transport, defense, industrial workwear, and absorbents, as well as FIBC fabrics and components. Further, it offers ARNO webbings/straps/ropes; industrial yarns and fibers; and FIBC/filling solutions, bags/FFS films, pallet coverings/packaging films, container liners/cargo protection, injections/buckets/pails/containers, thermoforming cups, EPS containers and trays, ropes and twines, crates, bags in boxes, and garbage bags. The company was founded in 1977 and is based in Alimos, Greece.

PPAK.AT.summary: Paperpack A.B.E.E. operates in the carton packaging industry in Greece and internationally. The company offers packaging solutions to pharmaceutical, personal care, food, tobacco, beverage and spirits, pop, and other industries. It also exports its products. The company was formerly known as TSOUKARIDIS J. CARTON PACKAGING INDUSTRY and changed its name to Paperpack A.B.E.E. in February 1999. Paperpack A.B.E.E. was founded in 1891 and is based in Kifissia, Greece.

SAR.AT.summary: Gr. Sarantis S.A., together with its subsidiaries, produces and trades in cosmetics, household products, and parapharmaceutical items in Greece. It operates through four segments: Mass Market Cosmetics, Household Products, Other Sales, and the Private Label Products. The company offers mass market cosmetics, such as fragrances and toiletries; skin, sun, and hair care products; baby shampoos; and other products. It also provides household products, including food care, home care, insect control, shoe care, and professional products. In addition, the company also offers health care products comprising personal hygiene and care products, food supplements, pregnancy and ovulation tests, and sun care products; and luxury cosmetics, including fragrance, treatment, and make up products. The company distributes its products through supermarkets, beauty shops, and pharmacies. Gr. Sarantis S.A. exports its products to approximately 40 countries. The company was founded in 1930 and is headquartered in Athens, Greece.

SATOK.AT.long_name: Sato office and Houseware supplies S.A.
SATOK.AT.summary: Sato office and Houseware supplies S.A. provides office and home furniture products in Greece. It offers office seats and amphitheaters, products for airports and conference facilities, products for clerical and managerial offices, and space dividers; and comfortable sofas, bookcases, functional clerks, ergonomic or managerial work chairs, and professional office products, as well as renews the living, dining, and bedroom product lines. The company sells its products through a distribution network of 7 exhibitions, 32 dealers, and 12 franchisees. It also operates a network of 20 stores. The company serves industry, trade, public, banks, freelancers, and individuals. It also exports its products to European, Balkan, and Arab countries. The company was founded in 1964 and is based in Heraklion, Greece.

VARG.AT.summary: Varangis Avepe S.A. designs, manufactures, and sells furniture and home interior products in Greece. The company provides home furniture products, including seating products, beds, tables, case furniture, occasional tables, upholstered pieces, and accessories, as well as textiles comprising duvets, pillowcases, sheets, bedspreads, blankets, throws, terry towels, bathrobes, pajamas, table linens, kitchen towels, aprons, details, and various accessories under the Lexington brand. It also offers office furniture products comprising acoustic paneling system, meeting, storage system, demountable partition system, group seating, workstation, task chair, and executive and lounge seating furniture, as well as reception and conference/theater/lecture hall furniture products. In addition, the company is involved in the development and implementation of custom designs, including work environments, as well as professional space solutions in partnership with various firms, architectural materials, and historic building restoration and turnkey interior architecture projects in the European Union, the Balkans, and the Persian Gulf. It serves customers in the turnkey projects consisting of professional spaces, banking institutions, retail networks, conference facilities, landmark buildings, hotels, and luxurious mega-yacht interiors. The company was founded in 1900 and is headquartered in Marousi, Greece.

VOSYS.AT.summary: Vogiatzoglou Systems S.A. provides products and solutions for store and warehouse furnishing in Greece. The company offers warehouse shelves and equipment, including pallet racks, drive in products, push backs, radio shuttles, live storage products, cantilevers, mezzanines, mezzanine and light duty shelves, and mobile archives; retail store equipment, such as super market carts and baskets, merchandise transportation carts and cages, airport carts, and customer guidance systems, as well as super market cash desks and service counters; and signage and promotion products. It also provides store equipment and furnishing products for super and mini markets, liquor and bakery, book, cosmetics, fashion, sports, home accessory, optics, toys, pet shop, electrical and electronics, DIY, and garden equipment stores. In addition, the company offers solutions for pharmacy equipment, furnishing, renovation, and design. Further, it trades in and distributes technical and DIY products. Vogiatzoglou Systems S.A. was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Metamorfosi, Greece.

YALCO.AT.long_name: YALCO - Socrates D. Constantinou & Son S.A.
YALCO.AT.summary: YALCO - Socrates D. Constantinou & Son S.A. distributes and supplies household and hotel equipment in Greece. It distributes and supplies porcelain products that include glassware, cutlery, kitchen utensils, and table accessories under IONIA name; nonstick aluminum cookware products under Fest name; and interior design products under Trimar brand name, as well as operates stores under Super Home Bazaar brand name. The company offers solutions for tabletop, buffet, kitchen, lobby, room service, and conference equipment. It serves customers through department stores, hypermarkets, supermarkets, home stores, and stores with electrical appliances. The company also exports its products to 35 countries. YALCO - Socrates D. Constantinou & Son S.A. was founded in 1920 and is based in Kifissia, Greece.
